successes.title: SilverAir SHIRT: Odorless Shirts Made With Pure Silver
successes.description: Premium performance shirts that don't smell. Designed for the gym, the city, and everywhere in between.

Pledges.description: Gym-Sack Lover : One (1) Y gym-sack - sleek and waterproof - carry it to the gym, or sport it when you travel. All rewards above this level include this gym-sack.
The Early Bird : One (1) SilverAir short-sleeve shirt in a color of your choice (45% off Retail Price - $54). Product comes in a Y gym sack and will have 'PRODUCTION 001' labeled on the inside.
The Single : One (1) SilverAir short-sleeve shirt in a color of your choice (37% off Retail Price - $54). Product comes in a Y gym sack and will have 'PRODUCTION 001' labeled on the inside.

The Single Long Sleeve : One (1) SilverAir long-sleeve shirt in a color of your choice (39% off Retail Price - $64). Product comes in a Y gym sack and will have 'PRODUCTION 001' labeled on the inside.
The Double : Two (2) SilverAir short-sleeve shirts in colors of your choice. (41% off Retail Price - $108). Products come in a Y gym sack and will have 'PRODUCTION 001' labeled on the inside.

The Double Long Sleeve : Two (2) SilverAir long-sleeve shirts in colors of your choice (42% off Retail Price - $128). Products come in a Y gym sack and will have 'PRODUCTION 001' labeled on the inside.
The Triple : Three (3) SilverAir short-sleeve shirts in colors of your choice (45% off Retail Price - $162). Products come in a Y gym sack and will have 'PRODUCTION 001' labeled on the inside.
If you want more than 3 shirts, just add $30 to your pledge for each additional shirt.
